extendedInfo.description: EVA absolutely blows away Google Now, Siri and every other assistant when it comes to useful features. If you haven't tried it yet what are you waiting for? TRY IT FOR FREE NOW: http://www.eva4android.com/evadownloadIt's the only assistant that has a dedicated car mode and literally over a hundred more features than the rest. Browse through the command list and you will see that it's no lie that EVA is the leader when it comes to useful features: http://www.eva4android.com/quickstartEVA is a must have app if you want to use voice to increase your productivity. It's like Siri but with so many truly useful functions you will wonder why it doesn't come standard with Android. It includes a dedicated Car Mode that is extremely useful if you want to use your phone while driving. It is the one application that makes your smart phone so much smarter. It includes a powerful Profiles feature that allows you to change loads of settings on your phone in one instant simply by changing the Profile. There are over 30 videos on YouTube (link below) that walk you though every aspect of the application. Take advantage of the free 28 day trial as you cannot possibly try it in a few hours let alone a week. Read the reviews to see what other people are saying and if you like it please tell your family, friends and co-workers.Who should use EVA? If you are looking for an application that provides hands-free operation of your phone then EVA is right for you. If you are just looking for an electronic friend to chat with then please go with one of the Siri clones. On the other hand if you want a real virtual assistant that has extremely useful functions that will make your life easier then please give EVA a try.EVA has all the functions you'd expect your assistant to perform plus some that you probably never knew were possible. Here is a list of some of the functions that you wont find in most of the competition:â Voice messaging, emails, memos and journals using your own voiceâ Reading and replying to incoming text (including Google Voice) and email (including Microsoft Exchange)â Reading and replying to incoming instant messages via Google Talkâ Integration with Google+â Integration with Evernoteâ Integration with Taskerâ Home Automation with INSTEON. Turn on the lights and appliances, open the garage door and a whole lot more, all with voice commands or scheduled or based on your location.â Time based reminders. Remind you to do something on a day and/or time.â Location based reminders. Remind you to do something based on your location.â Location based actions. Perform any function that EVA can do based on your current location. Have EVA automatically text your wife when you leave the office.â Time based actions. Perform any function that EVA can do on a set day and timeâ In-Car mode including wake up phrase and fully customizable function buttonsâ Custom voice shortcuts to your phone applications. Give your apps any name you want and open them using that name.â Voice bookmarks to your favorite web sites. â Activate just by shaking your phoneâ Works with all Bluetooth Headsets and most In-Car Bluetooth devicesâ Read and write NFC tags on compatible devicesâ Remote control your phone over Google Talkâ Too many other features to listFor the full online manual please go to:http://www.eva4android.com/evaIf you prefer a male assistant please choose EVAN instead. If you don't already have a third party text to speech voice that replaces the default Pico voice on your phone I recommend SVOX Classic.Download the Free SVOX Classic to demo the voices. EVA is English only. Please don't give 1 star ratings for not having your language.

reviews.title: Eva
reviews.comment: She works much better then any android app out there. I don\'t go a day without using her. Totally amazing. Absolutely worth it!!  She\'s a great help with constant new improvements couldn\'t ask for more
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still an Eva user.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using Eva on my Motorola Xoom for quite a while now. I recently bought an S3 and one of the first apps I installed was Eva and she runs quite a lot quicker on that than on the tablets. Peter is a great developer - The ONLY developer I\'ve ever known to respond to an automated bug-report and he fixed the issue within an hour or two and implemented a suggestion to work around an issue with TalkBack within a couple of days. Eva continues to get better and better even though there are a few niggles.
reviews.author: Paul Kerry

reviews.title: wonderful app
reviews.comment: This app does everything! What ever I want or need help with \"Eva\" does. Keep up the good work! I have never run across any app that works this well
reviews.author: Shannon Happel

reviews.title: Great assistant.
reviews.comment: I tried this app a year ago and wasn\'t sure about it.  The developer has told me that a news reading function is on his to do list, so that\'s fantastic. After the developer\'s continual dedication and improvements, I am now very happy with this app.   It is updated with new functions added at least twice a month, so you never know what extras are coming next, and that\'s exciting.  It works efficiently and is very useful.  Sold!
reviews.author: Philip Whitehead

reviews.title: Amazing and sophisticated.
reviews.comment: I have a galaxy note 2 and this assistant continues to unfold in its broad range of functions.   Car mode, calendar,  searches, and so much more.  My friends haven\'t seen any other app like it.  The updates are frequent and deepen functions.  Truly an assistant!  Seems that Peter is consistantly making improvements.  Many thanks!
reviews.author: David Walton

reviews.title: Smarter than I am
reviews.comment: Very powerful AI engine. I still get a brain lock when I\'m trying to use it - but that is because there are so many functions to choose from. The instructional videos on the YouTube channel for this application are nothing short of outstanding. I absolutely love Eva... even though I am quite sure that I am only utilizing 10 percent of her.  Interestingly, in retrospect that\'s about the same situation that I have with my beautiful wife of 30 years. Lol
reviews.author: Dave Lamme

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: this is a great app...but I have trouble keeping EVA awake ...have to restart my phone several times throughout  the day...so much better and useful than any other assistant s out there...use it a lot daily
reviews.author: Mario Castillo

reviews.title: Eva
reviews.comment: Nice concept, execution leaves much to be desired. not enough time to finish speaking.Often have unfinished commands and have to repeat them. I see your robot looking at the 4 possibilities and he\'s totally stupified. I\'m stupified as to why I can\'t just tap on the correct 1. I follow the instructions exactly. turn on applications. I don\'t understand try this. I just tried that and it didn\'t work.  For 10 dollars it does enough things , but this app maybe premature & you may be over your head. Eva=AVX- $10
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A superb app!
reviews.comment: I never bought an app before, but after a few days of the free trial it was a no-brainer. Eva\'s capabilities are absolutely amazing. The developer is very quick to respond to any issues. The other voice control apps don\'t even come close. This is the one to get!
reviews.author: Charlie Savage

reviews.title: Eva is using 80 - 90% CPU
reviews.comment: All the latest updates (at least 3+) seem to have made Eva run really slow, takes so long for the button to turn green when I click it, and constantly locks up my phone. When I freeze or uninstall Eva there are no lockups, when installed or defrosted continual lock ups. It\'s become so bad that I can\'t even use this program anymore. It used to be great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eva I love you but.....
reviews.comment: Only thing do far is car profile is active after I shut the car off and when I get a phone call not in car mode eva asks me how im doing when im trying to answer the call before it gors to voice mail. Otherwise I love the app
reviews.author: Greg Simoes

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Uh oh... Latest update killed Eva. Force close. Please rescue her. Need my assistant!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wasted my money?
reviews.comment: After trying out Eva intern I liked the app and decided to purchase the payed version. This version however now no longer reads me facebook post. I have gone through the settings and enabled speak but to no avail. Please fix or have I wasted my money purchasing the app. P.S. I use a Samsung Galaxy S4. Problem has been fixed as it was an Android issue
reviews.author: Ian Arnold

reviews.comment: Great. 5 stars
reviews.author: Ramiro Gonzalez

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Really love this app
reviews.author: Al Ambrose

reviews.title: I LOVE YOU EVA
reviews.comment: Best assistant available in the market. Well worth the purchase. Thanks Bulletproof keep up the good work.
reviews.author: James Blair

reviews.title: EVA
reviews.comment: Outstanding app love it.  Very nice while you\'re driving  I can check email facebook and so on.  Please continue to improve this program
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is a great app. Did have some problems but support was great and got it working great again. If you want a good assistant app I highly recommend this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eva is a great program.  Just love it!
reviews.comment: Keep the updates coming.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Forget the rest, Eva\'s the best.
reviews.author: john williams
